1.text: Raise the lvl of your support cards \nto get a support bonus!

2.text: The support bonus increases your team's \nscore at the Stadium!

3.text: Let's increase that support bonus! \nSupport points can be won at the Stadium too!

4.text: Your bonus has increased! \nKeep it up!

5.text: Everyone's support is growing more powerful! \nAnd your training options are improving while at it!

6.text: This is fantastic! \nYour Stadium score is bound to increaseâ™ª

7.text: Everyone's support is a big help! \nYou can expect a great score at the Stadium!

8.text: Your support bonus just maxed out! \nCongratulations!

9.text: The support bonus increases your team's \nscore at the Stadium!

10.text: Leveling up your support cards will \nincrease your support bonus!
